alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seneca, Schuyler, Yates, western Cayuga, Chemung, southwestern Tioga, eastern Steuben, western Tompkins and western Bradford Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 120 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Canandaigua to near Keeneyville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chemung, Ithaca, Elmira, Auburn, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Seneca Falls, Horseheads and Sayre. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 near 41. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 39 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
